Configuration.Description: ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A simple two telescope, dE-E detector setup for polarised beam measurements. A single 250 MHz PIXIE16 module. Each dE-E telescope consisting of a 500um si surface barrier detector as dE, and a 3x5" NaI (Tl) scintillator as E. A copy of the LED pulser Two 150um si detectors from the K-line polarimeter. Two logic signals from ion source, pol_up and pol_down. Single current integrator (CI) pulser train.
